name: Porygon-Z LV.X
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Decode
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for up to any 2 cards and shuffle your deck afterward. Then, put those cards on top of your deck in any order. This power can’t be used if Porygon-Z is affected by a Special Condition.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Porygon-Z. Porygon-Z LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
